channel.title: Whonix wiki comments will soon be possible
channel.description:
Comments below Whonix wiki pages will soon be possible. Here is a screenshot how it approximate will look like:
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/mediawiki/d/da/Comments.png
The comments field can be added below `Random News`.
Purpose:
* Allow quick and dirty feedback by users. * Anyone can comment. Even anonymous users. Unless it becomes a burden due to spam. * Posting (unencoded) external links may be restricted to discourage spam.
Non-purposes:
* User support. These will be redirected to the forums. * A free speech platform. (https://forums.whonix.org/t/limitations-on-free-speech-in-whonix-forums/4900) * Immortalization. A posted comment doesn't grant the right to remain there forever.
So there is need for a summary/introduction text which explains "comments will be deleted" and a link to a yet to be created `Wiki Comments Policy` page.
Technically implemented by using https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Comments.
----
> So there is need for a summary/introduction text which explains "comments will be deleted"
Comments will be deleted after some time. Specifically after comments have been addressed in form of wiki enhancements. See `Wiki Comments Policy`.
That text could be added on the https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:Footer page below " This is a wiki. Want to improve this page? Help is welcome and volunteer contributions are happily considered! See [Conditions for Contributions to Whonix](https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md), then [Edit](https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Footer&action=edit)! IP addresses are scrubbed, but editing over Tor is recommended. Edits are held for moderation.",
----
Thoughts?
